page.title: 11Our Journey.
page.content:
We left school at about 1.15 pm and walked towards Lower Park Farm.We turned into an area of wasteland and saw lots of Hawthorn trees. Lots of us stroked the foal but were told to stop in case we were attacked by the mare.
We then walked toward Havering Country Park.The forest was hugh and before we entered it we sketched the view.
The forest floor was very rough and dusty.There were lots of different trees and a variety of wild flowers.
We arrived at the village half an hour later and looked around the graveyard and bell tower.
Sharon Hunn, 1 BE
